Token.Abstract: Integrates SDWebImage async downloading and caching of remote images with UIButtonView.
Set the imageView image with an url.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Token.Abstract: Set the imageView image with an url and a placeholder.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: placeholder
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes.

Token.Abstract: Set the imageView image with an url, placeholder and custom options.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: placeholder
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The options to use when downloading the image. @see SDWebImageOptions for the possible values.

Token.Abstract: Set the imageView image with an url.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: completedBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block called when operation has been completed. This block as no return value and takes the requested UIImage as first parameter. In case of error the image parameter is nil and the second parameter may contain an NSError. The third parameter is a Boolean indicating if the image was retrived from the local cache of from the network.

In case of error the image parameter is nil and the second parameter may contain an NSError. The third parameter is a Boolean indicating if the image was retrived from the local cache of from the network.

Parameter.Abstract: A block called when operation has been completed. This block as no return value and takes the requested UIImage as first parameter. In case of error the image parameter is nil and the second parameter may contain an NSError. The third parameter is a Boolean indicating if the image was retrived from the local cache of from the network.

Token.Abstract: Set the backgroundImageView image with an url.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: placeholder
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes.

Token.Abstract: Set the backgroundImageView image with an url, placeholder and custom options.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: placeholder
Parameter.Abstract: The image to be set initially, until the image request finishes.

Parameter.Name: options

Token.Abstract: Set the backgroundImageView image with an url.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url for the image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The state that uses the specified title. The values are described in UIControlState.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when the image request succeed This block has no return value and takes the retrieved image as argument.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the image request failed. This block has no return value and takes the error object describing the network or parsing error that occurred (may be nil).
